verses.verse: Then the angel<WH4397> who was speaking<WH1696> with me returned,<WH7725> and roused<WH5782> me as a man<WH376> who<WH834> is awakened<WH5782> from his sleep.<WH8142>

And he said<WH559> to me, "What<WH4100> do you see<WH7200>?" And I said,<WH559> "I see,<WH7200> and behold,<WH2009> a lampstand<WH4501> all<WH3605> of gold<WH2091> with its bowl<WH1543> on the top<WH7218> of it, and its seven<WH7651> lamps<WH5216> on it with seven<WH7651> spouts<WH4166> belonging to each of the lamps<WH5216> which<WH834> are on the top<WH7218> of it;
also two<WH8147> olive<WH2132> trees<WH2132> by it, one<WH259> on the right<WH3225> side<WH3225> of the bowl<WH1543> and the other<WH259> on its left<WH8040> side.<WH8040> "
Then I answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> to the angel<WH4397> who was speaking<WH1696> with me saying,<WH559> "What<WH4100> are these,<WH428> my lord<WH113>?"
So the angel<WH4397> who was speaking<WH1696> with me answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> to me, "Do you not know<WH3045> what<WH4100> these<WH428> are?" And I said,<WH559> "No,<WH3808> my lord.<WH113>"

Then he answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> to me, "This<WH2088> is the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> to Zerubbabel<WH2216> saying,<WH559> 'Not by might<WH2428> nor<WH3808> by power,<WH3581> but by My Spirit,<WH7307>' says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

'What<WH4310> are you, O great<WH1419> mountain<WH2022>? Before<WH6440> Zerubbabel<WH2216> [you will become] a plain;<WH4334> and he will bring<WH3318> forth<WH3318> the top<WH7222> stone<WH68> with shouts<WH8663> of "Grace,<WH2580> grace<WH2580> to it!"' "
Also the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>

"The hands<WH3027> of Zerubbabel<WH2216> have laid<WH3245> the foundation<WH3245> of this<WH2088> house,<WH1004> and his hands<WH3027> will finish<WH1214> [it.] Then you will know<WH3045> that the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> has sent<WH7971> me to you.

"For who<WH4310> has despised<WH936> the day<WH3117> of small<WH6996> things<WH6996>? But these<WH428> seven<WH7651> will be glad<WH8055> when they see<WH7200> the plumb<WH913> <WH68> line<WH68> <WH913> in the hand<WH3027> of Zerubbabel<WH2216> â€“ [these are] the eyes<WH5869> of the Lord<WH3068> which<WH1992> range<WH7751> to and fro<WH7751> throughout<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>"
Then I answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> to him, "What<WH4100> are these<WH428> two<WH8147> olive<WH2132> trees<WH2132> on the right<WH3225> of the lampstand<WH4501> and on its left<WH8040>?"

And I answered<WH6030> the second<WH8145> time<WH8145> and said<WH559> to him, "What<WH4100> are the two<WH8147> olive<WH2132> branches<WH7641> which<WH834> are beside<WH3027> the two<WH8147> golden<WH2091> pipes,<WH6804> which empty<WH9553> the golden<WH2091> [oil] from themselves?"
So he answered<WH559> me saying,<WH559> "Do you not know<WH3045> what<WH4100> these<WH428> are?" And I said,<WH559> "No,<WH3808> my lord.<WH113>"
Then he said,<WH559> "These<WH428> are the two<WH8147> anointed<WH1121> <WH3323> ones,<WH1121> who are standing<WH5975> by the Lord<WH136> of the whole<WH3605> earth.<WH776>"
